result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on April 18, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Cases called at 10:59 AM: 21CF1125, 22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548, 22CF778, 22CF779.
Defendant Daniel L. Rieck appeared by video.  Attorney  Katherine Cook appeared in court for Karl A Schmidt.   Attorney Kelly Ronquist appeared in court for State of Wisconsin
Parties jointly request 21CF1125 be set for Jury Trial with  22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548, 22CF778, 22CF779 to ride along.
Branch 5 to schedule STC and 2 Day Jury Trial.
Status conference on October 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.

(Cases called at 8:33 AM - 21CF1125, 22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548, 22CF778, 22CF779)
Defendant Daniel L. Rieck in court with Attorney Karl A Schmidt.  Attorney Afton Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defense just received additional discovery yesterday - requests another status date.  Court notes the next status will be the last before setting the OWI for trial.  
Status Conference: October 26, 2022 at 11:00 AM
Status conference on October 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

(Cases 21CF1125, 22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548, 22CF778, 22CF779 are called at 9:47 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Daniel L. Rieck appeared by video.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt appeared by video separately. Deputy District Attorney Angela Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to personal appearance. 
22CF778 & 22CF779- Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. Court receives Not Guilty pleas. Defense requests Status Conference. 
Status Conference on all cases: October 4, 2022 at 8:30 AM (IN PERSON).
Status conference on August 15, 2022 at 09:45 am.

(Cases 21CF1125, 22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548, 22CF778, 22CF779 are called at 3:01 PM) Defendant Daniel L. Rieck appeared by video.  Attorney Karl A Schmidt in court for Daniel L. Rieck. Deputy District Attorney Angela Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to personal appearance. Defense acknowledges receipt of Information, waives reading, and enters Not Guilty pleas in 22CF548. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver in 22CF778, 22CF779. 
Arraignment in 22CF778, 22CF779 & Status Conference in 21CF1125, 22CF200, 22CF276, 22CF548: 08/15/2022 at 9:45 AM (Zoom).
